summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Construction Warehouse Management System. Backend APIs 95% functional with only resource assignment endpoint failing. Frontend fully functional with all pages, navigation, and CRUD operations working correctly.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 Internal Server Error when assigning resources to obras
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks resource assignment functionality in frontend

integration_issues.issue: Assignment dialog opens but backend assignment fails due to 520 error

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby attributes for accessibility

passed_tests: Frontend login page renders and works
Frontend CRUD forms for all resource types
Frontend obra detail page displays resources
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix resource assignment endpoint (/api/assignments) returning 520 Internal Server Error. This is blocking the resource assignment functionality between obras and resources (machines, equipment, tools, vehicles, materials).
